biocontainers.name: pyopenms
biocontainers.summary: pyOpenMS is an open-source Python library for mass spectrometry, specifically for the analysis of proteomics and metabolomics data in Python. pyOpenMS implements a set of Python bindings to the OpenMS library for computational mass spectrometry.

biotools.summary: Python library for mass spectrometry, specifically for the analysis of proteomics and metabolomics data.

bioschemas.name: pyOpenMS
bioschemas.summary: Python library for mass spectrometry, specifically for the analysis of proteomics and metabolomics data.
